document_data.name: Akrosz Ulvinhand
document_data.mainbody: '''Akrosz Ulvinhand''' was a [[human]] blacksmith who lived in the village of [[Amphail (village)|Amphail]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Akrosz was a very tall man and sported a beard.
document_data.Activities: Akrosz lived and worked in an establishment that was known as the [[Ulvinhand smithy]]. He only undertook commissions that interested him and local gossip claimed that many of these were blades later [[item enchantment|enchanted]] by [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Reputation: He was said to be the equal of any smith in [[Waterdeep]], making him counted among the best [[human]] smiths in all of the [[Sword Coast]].
